website_summaries.verdict: Once you determine the best size for you, these sleek, rounded toe oxfords will fit your style, whatever that may be. These are the most versatile shoes by Red Wing and will complete almost any look.
pros: Looks great with numerous fashions, from jeans to work wear
Also ideal for casual wear or semi-dressy attire
Crafted with quality in mind, which is typical of the brand
cons: they tend to fit too narrow or too large, and may seem longer in the toe than most shoes

customer_reviews.title: The best quality and best looking winter shoes I had. MADE in the U.S.A.
customer_reviews.text: Very good-looking and high-quality shoes. The leather quality, the craftwork make them some of the finest winter, 'mud and snow' shoes ever. Not the beauty of Allen Edmonds or Rossetti shoes, completely different style, but in the M+S conditions I mentioned it' s very hard to walk with shoes from the two top-brands I mentioned, even harder to wear them without damage. Last but not least: MADE in THE USA, with all this implies. I have seen, and once worn, shoes looking quite similar and costing less than half... well, you usually get what you pay, and as very often, who buys cheap, spends twice.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto F.

customer_reviews.title: TOO NARROW
customer_reviews.text: Holy narrow, who is this shoe designed to fit someone with a stick for feet? The shoe is of very good quality but it is way too narrow. I will try wearing it to loosen up the leather and see if that helps. If not it will be on its way back.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and have difficult finding good fitting shoes. The only work boots I can wear is Red Wing. I have tried to find cheep walking shoes and find the 80 or 90 dollar canvas shoes do not fit well and make my feet hurt. Decided to spend the extra for these hoes and glad I did. Fit without hurting right out of the box. No real break-in period no sores from rubbing or any other reason.
customer_reviews.author: Feral

customer_reviews.title: Fit larger than iron Rangers...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size as my iron rangers, but there was too much room in the toe box. I ended up having to return them. The seller was charging $50 more for the half-size smaller pair, so I ended up buying elsewhere. After a few day break in period, these shoes are just as you would expect from RedWing. Great quality and looks that will last years to come...I’m excited to own them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I expected classic Red Wing -- and I got classic Red Wing! I turned to Amazon because the store I had been buying these from turned out to be an empty shell when I went there. In fact, a lot of stores turned out to be empty shells; apparently the recovery hasn't reached that area yet. Others have noted that Red Wing sizes are not quite normal sizes. This may be true: my records indicate that my size is 13D, but in Red Wing I have always been able to use 12D comfortably. Snugly, but comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Person

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the feel even tho they are a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the feel even tho they are a 1/2 size to big. I wear a 10 1/2 and ordered as such. when they say get 1/2 size smaller they mean it. The leather insoles are molding to my foot and the leather is breaking in nicely. Looking forward to being fully broken in as I believe these will be my favorite shoes for work. I stand on concrete all day and the rubber soles have helped my back.
customer_reviews.author: L J

customer_reviews.title: it has been painful and now giving up and looking for something else
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Fan of Red Wing shoes. I have given these shoes months to break in..... it has been painful and now giving up and looking for something else. These have been very painful, and because the real break in period is longer than the return date allowed by the seller I am now stuck with new shoes that will collect dust.
customer_reviews.author: Powellcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Worn shoes???  The heels show other’s wear!!!
customer_reviews.text: I expected to get brand new, never before worn, shoes - especially for $232.22 (including $14.68 tax). I didn’t buy someone elses’ returns with worn heels - ughhhhhh
customer_reviews.author: John Q Public

customer_reviews.title: Damaged stitching and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pair I ordered arrived with messed up stitching and they ran a little big compared to the Red Wings I've had in the past. Overall these are one of the most uncomfortable Red Wings I've worn, these run a lot more narrow and long than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Leanan Sidhe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These work shoes will last for ever The leather and stitching are strong and comfortable if you need a good heavy shoe If you need an arch for your feet then these probably won't be what your looking for as they have little to none There a little pricey but worth it unless you like buying work shoes frequently
customer_reviews.author: jane gregoire

customer_reviews.title: Redwing shoes are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Redwing's real USA made shoes are made by hand with thick leather and take some time to break in. These shoes fit at a half size smaller than other Redwing's I have worn for over 30 years. Awesome shoes, and everyone loves their hand made shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Old Bike Punk

customer_reviews.title: Great protection with classic and trending look
customer_reviews.text: So handsome! Just needed a good amount of time to break them in then after that it’s all worth spending.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort level has dropped.
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing a nearly identical style for at least twenty years. Usually fit like a dream from the first wear. Insoles are not comfortable, unlike how they have been in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The Red Wings were a gift for my husband for his birthday. He had a pair about 10 years ago and totally wore them out. We tried to find them for quite a while. So glad I am glad I found them in time for his birthday. He says they are the most comfortable shoes he has ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, great American made quality but only wish that insole could be little more "slip" resistance, with dress socks your feet will kind of slide around on the inside of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JCFH

customer_reviews.title: Not for  me
customer_reviews.text: Arch was too pronounced and no insert so it was like standing on the floor with a pencil under your foot. Plus shoes are very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: dogo

customer_reviews.title: Here is another superb issue and leather creation from Red ...
customer_reviews.text: Here is another superb issue and leather creation from Red Wing. I walk with a lot of confidence in these shoes. They are simple, elegantly casual and built to last for a long time. I just wish they had more colors. I am strongly considering the sage mohave if I can still get my hands o feet on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. They took a couple weeks to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: First class quality. Great fit and made the USA. Need I say more.
customer_reviews.author: arthur d mcginnis III

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Size is WAY bigger than a normal US 9.5. Tried to get a smaller size but seller only has one size. Hmmm...weird.
customer_reviews.author: Jerm

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've got three pairs of Red Wing boots. This is my first pair of RW shoes. I love them. They are much easier to get on and lace up than the boots, and sometimes I don't need/want to wear over the ankle boots. As always, break in takes longer than just about any other brand of shoes/boots I've ever owned. But in the end, it's worth it. Don't wear them for a full day right off the bat. Start out wearing them 1-2 hours at a time. Then gradually ramp up the time and soon you'll be ready to wear them all day. As always, the heritage RWs are made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: JRoe

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe on the planet! The more you wear them the better they fit, look and feel. Not many shoes out there made like these anymore. Redwings keeps it real with hand made shoes with top quality material only!
customer_reviews.author: Slice916

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They look good w/ most pants, they're great on wet surfaces and they're built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kim

customer_reviews.title: Last Forever
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but extremely well-made shoe. I have old Red Wings that are 20-plus years old.
customer_reviews.author: HGA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoe, sizing is basically the same as red wing boots.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe 4th pair
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe 4th pair , have them in brown as well . Spend a little more and for a change it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: look nice. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Fit we'll. look nice. Good price. Comfort. Durability in question.
customer_reviews.author: ts

customer_reviews.title: Red Wings will be worn on other planets and prized ...
customer_reviews.text: Red Wings will be worn on other planets and prized by colonists for their comfort and build quality. Mine ran a full size bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: AfterDeath

customer_reviews.title: my favorite all time shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have become, admingtly after a hard fought battle against thread and leather, my favorite all time shoes. First off, they look great. I can wear jeans, or slacks, or a casual pant and they complement each trouser extremely well. I wear a 10 1/2 sneaker, a 10 boot, a 10 dress shoe, and i found that these fit best in a 9.5. The break in period is longer, but you'll come out of it a better man, with better shoes, and better looking women staring at you on the subway during your morning rush hour commute.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon in Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are built pretty well, and the leather is still in great ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are built pretty well, and the leather is still in great shape after quite a few miles. I'm sure I'm not the first to say this, but the sole wears away super quickly on the ball of the foot. I almost can't wear mine anymore because it's about to wear through. As an occasional shoe this is probably ok but if you will be on concrete walking long distances they will need resoled too soon for my taste. My old redwings have way more use but almost no sole wear.
customer_reviews.author: Zach G

customer_reviews.title: Shoe has been great for standing on concrete all day
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has been great for standing on concrete all day. They do require a break in period. High quality made in USA craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: The Q

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy American made. Comfortable as soon as I put them on. Run slightly large.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Taback

customer_reviews.title: Best work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. The best money I've spent on work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tindal

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Good looking boot and fits as expected. Haven't had a chance to break them in yet but looking forward to many years with this boot
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, very nice shoes. These have become my daily drivers since I started working in a more formal work environment. A lot of dress shoes these days seem to be made of pseudo-leather and weigh next to nothing. Not these. The leather is nice and they are on the heavy side. Just as I expected. The actual style is 8052. They run a bit large compared to my other pair of red wings 6" moc boot. I've worn them just a week but they are breaking in nicely. Looking forward to many years of wear.
customer_reviews.author: David Popdan

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: have a couple pair of red wing boots. love them. love these just as much. they got to me quick.
customer_reviews.author: jefd

customer_reviews.title: Need to Downsize from Original Order
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered size 12, my regular size. I needed to return these and downsize to 11.5. While the shoe's construction is superior, they should have been sold with rawhide laces. The laces included with the shoe will loosen unless double loops are used.
customer_reviews.author: m r mittleman

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am from Ecuador and I make the purchase by this route and shoes are perfect, only should clarify a little selection of sizes, for example my foot measures 26.5 cm but I have 1 extra large cm than measured my foot, for the rest I am very satisfied, my expectations are fulfilled, price worth paying.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Donoso

customer_reviews.title: Breaking in the leather/cork was a challenge but a couple days wearing double socks and we were good to go
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these almost daily for months now. I found them to run a bit large, and a bit narrow. Breaking in the leather/cork was a challenge but a couple days wearing double socks and we were good to go.
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe, not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. However obviously made on a boot last. My normal size is 8D. I purchased a 7.5D and the fit is like an E (wide). Red Wing should consider making the same shoe on a shoe last, and perhaps offering different widths. I suspect most buyers are getting these shoes for casual wear, not to wear on a construction site.
customer_reviews.author: JVAN

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. They run just a bit bigger than my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They run just a bit bigger than my 10875s, but I am happy with my decision to not go down 1/2 size as I've seen recommended, however YMMV. I feel like the break in process will be relatively easy, and I'm not sure I'll add insoles to these, as the leather insole is more comfortable than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Not sure you should buy shoes this expensive Online.
customer_reviews.text: Something was wrong with this pair, the right side shoe especially. The quality looked like what I expected (I've been a long time Red Wing customer), but the odd fitting right shoe hurt the top of my foot. I sent them back and went to the local Red Wing store (about an hour away for me, which is why I tried to get them online), where I had gotten my Red Wing work boots. I tried on different models at the store and came away very happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blasco

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Red Wing Heritage - very high quality shoes that will last you at least 10 years. You can wear every day, but it is better to have two pairs of shoes and wear through the day, whatever shoes resting.
customer_reviews.author: zonder

customer_reviews.title: As good as getting it locally.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price compared to purchasing it locally. I would say the quality wise, as good as getting it locally. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lim

customer_reviews.title: Everything I thought and more!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely adores these shoes.they are comfy, sturdy and very well made. I would buy them again and again.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Red Wings are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Though I am a bit biased... Red Wing are my go to boots. Purchased these for the warmer seasons. Though I did return them but not of any fault of the oxfords. After wearing the 875,875, and 8111 for so long it's hard to switch to a low profile boot. But if that's your thing these are a must!
customer_reviews.author: D.Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed, I'm a machinist and am on my feet 9 hrs a day, I've bought $50 boots that have had more support, had I bought larger boots sure I could use an extra insert, but, for this money I expected something more. You dont buy a Porsche and need new tires to make it drive well. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat large & not as comfy as your other boots that I have bought before & will not buy these again Thank you Scott
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hawe

product_meta.title: Red Wing Heritage Men's Classic Oxford
product_meta.description:
Inspired by the iconic 875 and 877 work boots, Red Wing’s Moc Toe oxfords were built for workers who didn’t need the support of a tall boot but wanted the durability and comfort for which our boots are known.

Red Wing brings its reputation for quality work boots to the Work Oxford. This no-nonsense offering boasts a durable leather upper and triple-stitched seams. The crepe sole on a subtle wedge gives you the grip and comfort your need for a long day on the job. Let Red Wing make your workweek just a little cushier with the Work Oxford.

For almost a century, Red Wing Shoes has been producing top-quality work boots and shoes. It started with a corner store in the quiet river town of Red Wing, Minn. Today, Red Wing Shoes produces thousands of handmade shoes every day, making their legendary quality available worldwide. A true American success story, Red Wing Shoes provided footwear for the U.S. Military in both World Wars. Norman Rockwell created artwork for the company during the 1960s. And in the new global economy, Red Wing Shoes continues to evolve to meet the needs of a new generation, with more than 150 styles perfect for work or play. Red Wing Shoes is legendary for producing tough, durable footwear that can handle any challenge. Their shoes and boots are created with four principles in mind: quality, durability, comfort, and craftsmanship. Each is given a hand inspection before being sent out the door, to ensure that it meets Red Wing Shoes' exacting standards. And the quality of their footwear is guaranteed. So look to Red Wing Shoes first for footwear that lasts.

See more
